Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can draw different types of plants and accurately illustrate those receiving water as healthy and growing.
The student can show that plants with adequate light are thriving and healthy.
The student can depict plants without water as wilting or not growing well.
The student can illustrate plants in the dark as struggling or not growing, effectively demonstrating the need for light.
CANNOT: The student may occasionally understate the severity of a plant's condition without water or light (e.g., showing a plant that's slightly wilted instead of severely affected).
The student might miss labeling every element, such as not labeling the light source in one instance, though understanding is apparent.
